where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update PMS_MERCHANT_INFO
MERC_ID = #{mercId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SELLER_NO = #{sellerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MERC_NAME = #{mercName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHORTNAME = #{shortname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESSNAME = #{businessname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MCC_CD = #{mccCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAINBUSINESS = #{mainbusiness,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TAX_CERT_ID = #{taxCertId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LICENSEISSUINGDATE = #{licenseissuingdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LICENSEDUEDATE = #{licenseduedate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGISTEREDCAPITAL = #{registeredcapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REGISTRATIONDEADLINE = #{registrationdeadline,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOMERTYPE = #{customertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NATUREBUSINESS = #{naturebusiness,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESSCHANNELS = #{businesschannels,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESSLOCATION = #{businesslocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESSAREA = #{businessarea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESSAREAOF = #{businessareaof,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SALESWAY = #{salesway,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGISTEREDADDRESS = #{registeredaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUS_ADDR = #{busAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STARTBUSINESSDATE = #{startbusinessdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NORMALBUSINESSDATE = #{normalbusinessdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANKNAME = #{bankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SETTLEMENTNAME = #{settlementname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLR_MERC = #{clrMerc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANKSYSNUMBER = #{banksysnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRP_NM = #{crpNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRP_ID_NO = #{crpIdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILEPHONE = #{mobilephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HEADQUARTERSBANK = #{headquartersbank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATION_NAME = #{creationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATIONDATE = #{creationdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMOVETAG = #{removetag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENT_NUMBER = #{agentNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRP_ID_TYP = #{crpIdTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RET_MESSAGE = #{retMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PREMIUMRATE = #{premiumrate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MERC_CLEAR = #{mercClear,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MERC_STS = #{mercSts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KYACCOUNT = #{kyaccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLEAR_TYPE = #{clearType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BUSINESS = #{business,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TRUEMERDATE = #{truemerdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHECKMERDATE = #{checkmerdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLYDATE = #{applydate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GENERAL_NAME = #{generalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZIP_CODE = #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARD_STARTDATE = #{cardStartdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARD_ENDDATE = #{cardEnddate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_PROVINCE = #{bankProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_CITY = #{bankCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESSRANGE = #{businessrange,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TAXREGISTCARDENDDATE = #{taxregistcardenddate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TAXREGISTCARD = #{taxregistcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ALTLAT = #{altLat,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GPSADDRESS = #{gpsAddress,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
settleRateType = #{settleRateType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
and MOBILEPHONE = #{mobilephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CUSTOMERTYPE = #{customertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and OAGENTNO = #{oAgentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select pmi.MERC_ID,pmi.MERC_NAME,pmi.MOBILEPHONE,TO_CHAR(pmi.STATUS) STATUS,pmi.IMAGE_URL, TO_CHAR(tcc.BALANCE) BALANCE ,pmi.EXTERNAL_ID externalId from PMS_MERCHANT_INFO pmi ,T_ACC_ACCOUNT tcc where pmi.KYACCOUNT = tcc.ACC_NUM and pmi.MERC_ID= #{mercid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select MERC_STS from PMS_MERCHANT_INFO where MERC_ID= #{mercid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(1) from posp_route_info where OWNER_ID=(select ID from PMS_MERCHANT_INFO where MERC_ID=#{mercid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and CHANNEL_CODE=#{channelcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and STATUS='1'

select pmi.OAGENTNO,pmi.MERC_ID, pao.LOWESTSETTLERATE,pao.LOWESTRATE ,pao.AGENT_NUMBER
from PMS_MERCHANT_INFO pmi ,PMS_AGENT_INFO pao
where pmi.MERC_ID=#{mercid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and pao.AGENT_NUMBER= pmi.AGENT_NUMBER
mapper.update: update PMS_MERCHANT_INFO t set t.position=(select to_number(m.position) from PMS_MERCHANT_INFO m where m.merc_id=#{machId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})+ to_number(#{payMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) where t.merc_id=#{machId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update PMS_MERCHANT_INFO t set t.positionT1=(select to_number(m.positionT1) from PMS_MERCHANT_INFO m where m.merc_id=#{machId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})+ to_number(#{payMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) where t.merc_id=#{machId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update PMS_MERCHANT_INFO t set t.position=(select to_number(m.position) from PMS_MERCHANT_INFO m where m.merc_id=#{machId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})- to_number(#{payMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR})-((select to_number(m.poundage) from PMS_MERCHANT_INFO m where m.merc_id=#{machId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})*100) where t.merc_id=#{machId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update PMS_MERCHANT_INFO t set t.positionT1=(select to_number(m.positionT1) from PMS_MERCHANT_INFO m where m.merc_id=#{machId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})- to_number(#{payMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR})-((select to_number(m.poundage) from PMS_MERCHANT_INFO m where m.merc_id=#{machId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})*100) where t.merc_id=#{machId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
